resources.string: A female figure leads people along a mountain path, austere landscape, restrained cool colors, a sense of movement and spiritual journey.
A small wooden cabin on a rocky slope among tall pine trees, with a hazy mountain landscape in the distance, a calm secluded atmosphere.
A mountain range with high snow-covered peaks, sharp contrasts of light and shadow, cold blue and white tones, a sense of natural grandeur.
Ancient boats with warriors approach the shore, vivid decorative colors, water and sky forming a rhythmic pattern, a sense of arrival and occasion.
Figures engaged in a ritual in an open space, rich contrasting colors, dynamic composition, a sense of ceremony and energy.
